700957f-a.text:
Eastchester Road, south from (No. 1890) about 150 yards south of Wilkinson Ave., to Morris Park Ave., showing the thoroughfare being repaved by the W.P.A.
September 2, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
